WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTH COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL
   17 JUL BY M/V SUBSEA VIKING
   IN AREA BOUND BY
   24-37.50S 042-42.88W, 24-52.67S 042-35.05W,
   24-43.65S 042-14.72W, 24-28.45S 042-22.75W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 18 JUL 19.
